event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SLIMER
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Oh, goodnesss, looksss like sssomeone hasss woken usss up from our ssslumber! Boysss and girlsss, give this little nosssy Renegade a little tassste of why I pay you guysss so much! Arm the nebula cannonsss!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SLIMER_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SLIMER_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SLIMER_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_PHYS
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"IONIC GASSES! SHELL GASSES! ION ION ION! HEEELP!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_PHYS_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_PHYS_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_PHYS_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_ALEENOR
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Oh, fantastic! New Renegade experiment! I have been waiting to test this new pheromone mixture for long time! Stronger than dumb Free Mantis, faster than normal pheromones, sharper than big Suzerain pheromones!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_ALEENOR_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_ALEENOR_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_ALEENOR_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_VIN
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"So... cold... I... I can't feel the heat... anymore... your ship... let me in! Let me in, LET ME IN!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_VIN_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_VIN_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_VIN_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CLEO
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"What the hell? What is a filthy Federation ship doing here?! You tried to ask for help by leading us to a Fed ship, didn't you?! You useless freak! I knew we should have murdered you back when we took your piece of crap cruiser, now get your ass moving!"
You suddenly hear the sound of a loud shock and someone screaming in pain.
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CLEO_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CLEO_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CLEO_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_ZULU
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Renegade, let me tell you the fundamental truth of the universe. There is no light, there is no warmth or salvation, only death and darkness. Don't resist. Don't fight it, for it will only make the pain worse..."
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_ZULU_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_ZULU_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_ZULU_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_G
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Ohoho! A new target dummy! Perfect! Renegade, my name is G, of the Royal city Liythkyk Yuk! Prepare for your last living moments, staring at my perfect energy shields!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

choice.text: (Queen Y) "Stand down, loyal servent. This is an order!"

event.text: G is visibly taken aback as she powers down her weapons. "M-My queen! I'm so sorry your highness! Please forgive my transgression!" She quickly transfers all the scrap she has on hand as well as the special weapon her ship carried!

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_G_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_G_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_G_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_DEADSHIP
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"You will ALL fall! All life will be extinguished from this mortal plane, and only the dammed will roam the earth! Fall and despair, mortals!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_DEADSHIP_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_DEADSHIP_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_DEADSHIP_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SMOKE
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"I don't need weapons or drones to beat you! My mere presence is enough to break your bones into splinters and shatter your soul into so many pieces that nobody will ever be able to bring you back!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SMOKE_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SMOKE_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SMOKE_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CHILLS
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Ahahaaa! I'm on fire today! Another Renegade, ready to feel the burn! Can't wait to fry your brain with my red-hot skills! Friends, fire up the weapons! There will be nothing but ashes once we are finished!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CHILLS_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CHILLS_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CHILLS_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_POK
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Pok mok bok sok lok!" You attempt to translate whatever the blob is saying, but all you get is a Braille image of a middle finger.
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_POK_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_POK_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_POK_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CHARROR
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"[ERROR] [PRE-BATTLE DIALOG = NOT FOUND] [BACKUP DIALOG = CORRUPTED]"
"K~62-= I479;. L-45\\ L=-=- M1-3= E221Â´0"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CHARROR_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CHARROR_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_CHARROR_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_LEO
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Can this be?! An actual challenge?! Well well well, Renegade, I'm sorry to say this, but... the minute we end this call, your ship will be pelted by my endless barrage of high-speed lasers. I recommend you just give up right now."
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

"...oh... Should we... reconsider...?"
"...crap."

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_LEO_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_LEO_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_LEO_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SEARAK
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Being of indeterminate gender from the opposing vessel! My name is Searak, and I command the most glorious and powerful vessel this side of the Multiverse! I expect a Renegade such as you will pose a considerable challenge, so... please, don't disappoint me!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SEARAK_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SEARAK_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SEARAK_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_AUTO
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Enemy ship located. Peacekeeping protocols A-650.100 initiated. Goodbye."
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_AUTO_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_AUTO_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_AUTO_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_WATCHER
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"You have rested for long enough, little one. Time to awaken, and to do what you were made to do from the moment your atoms were born in the fires of the beginning."
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_WATCHER_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_WATCHER_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_WATCHER_DROP
event.text: You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_FLAGSHIP
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence.
"Federation scum! You are about to witness... my greatest creation! Oh, they thought my ideas of cloning them were too risky, they called it 'a blasphemy'... But I will show them, I will show them all!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_FLAGSHIP_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_FLAGSHIP_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_URN_BONUS
event.text: Before you can determine what to loot from the carcass of the massive vessel you've just laid low, the urn begins to glow again. All of the souls of every last apparition you've fought are all dragged back into the urn, mixing in a swirl of every color, real or beyond your senses. The urn then shuts closed, a few cracks forming in its shell and rapidly filling with gold...
It takes a few minutes for you to recover, but as you do, you manage to get your thoughts in order enough to see what the ship's loot was.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_FLAGSHIP_DROP
event.text: You find a very strange individual in the bowels of the ship. Upon noticing your presence, they immediately bow and swear absolute fealty to you, claiming you "created" them. The remains of one of the ship's rooms reveal several documents mentioning the existence of a project to clone the leaders of the Coalition! Thankfully... the project appears to have been scrapped following a single attempt ending in failure.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_AUGUSTUS
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence. The ship's hull appears to be made entirely out of gold; rumor has it a ship like this belonged only to the richest Phantom to ever live. Augustus, slain by mutiny, the ghost of a Ghost with the most.
"Hark, pray to the lords that you evacuate with haste! Elsewise thine vessel's rust and decay might erode mine own's most invaluable shine! Shall thou refuse to meet my demands, expect a most swift death of peculiar means... For I shall dismantle thine hull with projectiles of solid gold, salvage the remains, and become even richer!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_AUGUSTUS_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_AUGUSTUS_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_AUGUSTUS_DROP
event.text:
You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.
In addition, someone who appears to be the same person you just killed appears aboard your ship, fading into existence. Before you can fire upon him, he swears loyalty, praising you for freeing him from his "captor", apparently an impostor.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SALLY
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence. The ship's hull seems to mostly be composed of flesh, matching old tales of a scientist who fused themselves with their pet spider in order to save their own life.
"Oh my stars! If it isn't a new friend! Now, please don't be upset, dear, but a force beyond my control command I fight you! Quite unfortunate for you, but at least I promise you... I will keep you company in the afterlife, you are my new friend after all!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SALLY_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SALLY_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_SALLY_DROP
event.text:
You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.
In addition, someone who appears to be the same person you just killed appears aboard your ship, fading into existence. Before you can fire upon them, they swear loyalty, praising you for freeing them from their "captor", apparently an impostor.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_PRINCE
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence. A shroud of absolute darkness masks parts of the ship's true appearance. According to legend, a vessel like this was commanded by a being known as the Prince of Darkness, a demonic spirit in the form of an Equinoid. The Prince does not speak to you, simply branding their message directly in your mind.
"And so, another mortal challenges me. I am from the depths of a place inconceivable, and I have seen eons pass in the blink of an eye. Your life, to me, is but a single atom in the grand design of the Multiverse. Fight well, Renegade, and impress me - you may find yourself with quite a reward."
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_PRINCE_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

You find the remains of a unique weapon model among the ruins of the ship, but it appears it did not survive the fight. You'll have to be more careful next time, or get lucky. Fortunately, there's still a bit more supplies to take with you.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_PRINCE_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_PRINCE_DROP
event.text:
You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.
The Prince manifests in front of you as you return to the ship. Before you can draw your blaster, you hear the words ring out in your head. "Be not afraid, mortal. I come to offer your spoils of war, and to join you for the remainder of your errand. I do hope your presence will not tarnish my reputation."

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_TRIRIAC
event.text:
You reach the spot specified by the urn. As expected, a vessel of unique design orbits the beacon, hailing you the moment it senses your presence. Its lights begin to draw your mind in, and you can barely resist its allure. There is no legend attached to this vessel, nor is there any hull design you could imagine it'd be even remotely close to.
The being in charge of the vessel begins to speak, the very words sending your brain into searing pain, migraines pushing their way through your head. "CHILD OF MAN. DO NOT RESIST THE CALL."
"SUBMIT."
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_TRIRIAC_DESTROYED
event.text: The mighty vessel has been eliminated! Within its wreckage remains plenty of scrap and supplies for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_TRIRIAC_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_REVENANT_APPARITION_TRIRIAC_DROP
event.text:
You're also surprised to find a special weapon among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely close to something like this before, so you assume it must be a custom model made by the strange beings.
The strange entity in command begins to manifest in front of you, and you brace yourself for a mental assault unlike anything you've ever seen. But... it doesn't come, and the burly being simply retreats into the bowels of the ship. Perhaps... they will work with you, for now.
